name: Invisible Haunting
description:
Invisible Haunting is a horror game. in this game, you are trapped in an apartment where you have to find a way out whereas a creepy soul tries to Hunt you. In this game, you have various types of equipment that will help to get out of the apartment

NOTE: This game is still under development. We Except to have Bugs and Glitches

IF you Experience any issues Please Let us KNow by this email: invisiblehaunting93@gmail.com or By chat box on our website.

We will try to respond as soon as possible
